casebody.data:
IN RE: STYLES, Jr. 158P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Sarah Kirkman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Robert Lee Styles, for Styles, Robert Lee (Jr.)

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of May 2018 by Petitioner for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
